product_name: Patagonia Wind Shield Jacket - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Ideal when full-bore rain protection isn't needed, this highly packable Patagonia Wind Shield jacket supplies stout wind protection in a lightweight, moisture-wicking and quick-drying package. Main body is constructed with a windproof polyester fabric that has a polyurethane film sandwiched between face and backing for exceptional windproof performance. Deluge(R) Durable Water Repellent finish sheds light snow and rain. Polartec(R) Power Dry(R) stretch fleece panels under arms and at cuffs enhance breathability and quick-drying performance. Full-length zipper has a draft flap to prevent the chill from seeping through; tall collar has a brushed fleece lining for next-to-skin comfort. 2 zippered hand pockets; zippered lower back pocket features an internal cord pass-through for easy cable routing to your media player. Raglan sleeves eliminate shoulder seams for increased range of motion and comfort. Slightly dropped tail increases coverage; single-pull drawcord at hem helps seal out the elements. Reflective detailing increases your visibility in low light. The Patagonia Wind Shield jacket fits close to the body. Closeout.
short_description: Ideal when full-bore rain protection isn't needed, this highly packable Patagonia Wind Shield jacket supplies stout wind protection in a lightweight, moisture-wicking and quick-drying package.
